name: nano-prettify
description: Prettify / format Nano (formally RaiBlocks) raw amounts to be more human-readable. Format amounts in any Nano compatible unit e.g. unano, Gnano etc.... Adds decimal point and commas where necessary. Raw amounts are commonly returned when interacting with a Nano node.

scripts.build:dist: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir dist

author: Frank Kilkelly
